text: Allaha, yijane tomalokara babe prthiraika sthitisila karaiche arau akasakhanaka karai diche cada arau teraemi tomalokara akrti diche tara pichata tomalokara akrtika sundara raupa diche lagate tomalokaka paraitra bastura paraa jiraika dana karaiche. Teraemi allaha, tomalokara raba. Eteke srstijagatara raba allaha kimana ye barakatamaya
